entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
